cast.name: 卡安·乌尔甘哲奥卢 Kaan Urgancioglu
穆菲特·卡亚坎 Müfit Kayacan
梅尔特姆·帕米尔坦 Meltem Pamirtan
皮纳尔·德尼兹 Pınar Deniz
伊佩克·菲利兹·亚兹齐 Ipek Filiz Yazici
奥利维尔·帕里斯 Olivier Paris
塞拉哈廷·帕萨利 Selahattin Paşalı
梅尔特·亚亚齐切尤 Mert Yazıcıoğlu
菲里·巴伊库·古勒 Feri Baycu Güler

introduction: The story begins in today Istanbul, when a woman called Işık (Bade İşçil) arrives at an old house. There she recalls the past and friends of her youth.Back in 1998, a group of young people (Eda, Osman, Sinan and Kerem) studying in a school of Istanbul are at risk of exclusion because of their poor behaviour. They are very different from their classmates and, therefore, very lonely. A headmaster and most of the teachers are against them, and only one called Burcu (Pınar Deniz) does her best to protect the youngsters. However, they find out that Burcu is getting relocated, and this means that all of them will be excluded after her departure. In order to prevent this, students unite and make a plan: they will make Burcu fall in love so that she stays in Istanbul. According to the law, after marriage she will be able to choose a place of work by herself. They ask for help from Işık, an excellent student and a girl with a big heart. Soon she becomes a part of their company. This union helps the students change for the better, understand themselves, realize the importance of true friendship, find love and their own way in life. At the same time, their plan helps Burcu change her outlook on life and find true love with a new unsociable teacher called Kemal (Kaan Urgancıoğlu).
